channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: District attorney’s progressive policies face blowback from Louisiana’s conservative Legislature
item.description: New Orleans District Attorney Jason Williams promised to address the city’s history of prosecutorial and police misconduct.

item.title: Christa McAuliffe, still pioneering, is first woman with a statue on New Hampshire capitol grounds
item.description: Christa McAuliffe is still a pioneer, decades after she was picked to become America’s first teacher in space.

item.title: Thousands to parade through Brooklyn in one of world’s largest Caribbean culture celebrations
item.description: New York City’s West Indian American Day Parade will kick off in Brooklyn with thousands of revelers dancing and marching through the borough in one of the world’s largest celebrations of Caribbean culture.
